title: GTA V
about: Welcome to Los Santos. When a young street hustler, a retired bank robber, and a terrifying psychopath find themselves entangled with the most dangerous elements of the underworld, they must pull off a series of dangerous heists to survive in a ruthless city.

title: CS:GO
about: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive expands on the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered more than 20 years ago.

title: Hollow Knight
about: The sequel to the award-winning action-adventure. Explore a vast haunted kingdom and fight deadly foes as Hornet.

title: Elden Ring
about: An epic fantasy action-RPG adventure set within a world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin.

title: Valorant
about: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter from Riot Games. Combine precise gunplay with unique agent abilities.

title: Stardew Valley
about: Turn an overgrown field into a thriving farm. Raise animals, grow crops, and become part of the community.

title: Minecraft
about: A sandbox game where you can explore infinite worlds and build everything from simple houses to grand castles.

title: Forza Horizon 5
about: Explore the vibrant open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of cars.

title: Dead Cells
about: A rogue-lite, metroidvania-inspired action-platformer. Explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
about: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification.

title: Overwatch 2
about: Team up in this free-to-play hero shooter to push the payload and capture objectives with your friends.

title: Rocket League
about: Soccer meets driving in this award-winning, high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem!
